tags.name: xtal-state-commit
tags.description: Inserts its history property into the history.state object with an optional specified path

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: Title to use when calling push/replace state

customEvents.name: history-changed
customEvents.description: Fires when the element instance updates history.  Does not fire when history is updated elsewhere.

tags.name: xtal-state-update
tags.description: xtal-state-update extends xtal-state-commit, but adds the ability to *deep merge* changes to the existing history.state object, even with the same path, if it exists, so that other history updates done by other pieces of code will be even less likely to be lost.

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: Title to use when calling push/replace state

customEvents.name: history-changed
customEvents.description: Fires when the element instance updates history.  Does not fire when history is updated elsewhere.
